items.title: Photos of Missouri Tornado: Jefferson City Damage ‘Extensive’
items.abstract: The aftermath of a tornado that tore through Missouri’s state capital Wednesday night.

items.title: How Loneliness Is Damaging Our Health
items.abstract: Even before the pandemic, there was an “epidemic of loneliness,” and it was affecting physical health and life expectancy.

items.title: Judd Architecture Office in Marfa Severely Damaged in Fire
items.abstract: The artist Donald Judd’s two-story office in Texas was in the final stages of a renovation that was set to finish July 3.

items.title: Tornado Tears Through City in Kansas, Causing Extensive Damage
items.abstract: No fatalities were reported in the city of Andover, near Wichita, but up to 1,000 structures may have been affected, officials said.

items.title: Highways Have Sliced Through City After City. Can the U.S. Undo the Damage?
items.abstract: The Biden administration is funding projects around the country aimed at reconnecting communities that have been divided by transportation infrastructure.
